value.title: Avoid refresh errors with missing columns in Power BI/Power Query

value.title: Bulk import data from multiple pages on a website with Power BI Desktop - Power BI Tips & Tricks #04

value.title: DAX Fridays! #14: SUMMARIZE
value.excerpt: Learn how to use the function SUMMARIZE in DAX/ Powerpivot. Source:https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/gg492171.aspx
